item.description:
Please Read

This year my clambake will be in August, I usually do this in September but it just won't work this year, so August it is.

This is a BYOLC clambake, meaning you bring your own lobster and clams, and something to share.

For your $5 I provide the cooking utensils, soda, corn on the cob, butter and place settings.

This year we'll be at Hilton Park.  In previous years we were at Fort McCleary which was great but people got lost, last year we were at 4 Tree Island which was nice, but a long walk over the causeway and difficult to find parking.  Hilton Park should solve those problems, it's exit 5 off the Spaulding turnpike just over the bridge from Portsmouth to Dover.  There is plenty of parking and we can park close to the picnic tables.

There is no rain date, if weather looks iffy check this site for updates.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the vicinity of the playground. Look for the site with the most picnic tables.

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: BYOLC Clambake
